abstract: Military officials say three American military contractors were killed in shooting in military area of Kabul's international airport; Afghan gunman was also killed.
lead_paragraph: Some reports said the Americans, who were military contractors, were killed by a man wearing an Afghan military uniform.
snippet: Some reports said the Americans, who were military contractors, were killed by a man wearing an Afghan military uniform.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Three Americans Are Killed in a Shooting at Kabul Airport
headline.print_headline: Three Americans Are Killed in a Shooting at Kabul Airport
